institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 2 (Scope of Application)
contents: Article 2 (Scope of Application) ① Matters related to consortium business shall be governed by these rules, except as specifically provided for in laws and other internal regulations. ② Matters not specified in these rules shall be subject to contract-related laws and corporate accounting standards, such as the Act on Contracts to which the State is a Party, the Enforcement Decree and Enforcement Rules of the same Act, accounting regulations, notices, notices, and directives of relevant ministries such as the Ministry of Strategy and Finance. Apply mutatis mutandis. ③ Matters not specified in these rules may be handled by the joint training center in accordance with the internal regulations of the joint training center by applying the budget and fund management plan execution guidelines published annually by the Ministry of Strategy and Finance.
